summary.span: 命名空间包含用于在文档中支持数据缓存的类和属于 Visual Studio Tools for Office 运行时的类。

span.span: The namespace contains classes that support data caching in documents, and classes that are part of the Visual Studio Tools for Office runtime .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包含以下类：The namespace contains the following classes: - 。. 此属性用于将对象添加到文档中的数据缓存文档级自定义项中。Use this attribute to add an object in a document-level customization to the data cache in the document. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data)。For more information, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data). - 接口。The interface. （可选） 可以在您将添加到文档中的数据缓存的对象上实现此接口。You can optionally implement this interface on objects that you add to the data cache in a document. 如果你想要获得更好地控制对象的缓存行为，请实现此接口。Implement this interface if you want to gain greater control over the caching behavior of the object. - 可以通过引发的异常[!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]。Exceptions that can be thrown by the [!INCLUDE[vsto_runtime](~/includes/vsto-runtime-md.md)]. - 其他类，属于 Visual Studio 基础结构，并且不应通过代码直接使用。Other classes that are part of the Visual Studio infrastructure, and are not intended to be used directly by your code.
